00042             function                test_add()
00043             {
00044                   try
00045                   {
00046                         $ErrorLogAccess = get_package( 'error_log::error_log_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00047                         $ErrorLogAccess->add_message_to_log( 1 , 'title' , 'description' );
00048                         $Messages = $ErrorLogAccess->unsafe_select_messages( '1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0 , 1' );
00049                         
00050                         if( count( $Messages ) != 1 )
00051                         {
00052                               return( 'Illegal messages count' );
00053                         }
00054                         
00055                         $Message = $Messages[ 0 ];
00056                         if( $Message->severity != 1 || $Message->title != 'title' || $Message->description != 'description' )
00057                         {
00058                               return( 'Illegal field value' );
00059                         }
00060                         
00061                         $ErrorLogAccess->delete_error_log( $Message->id );
00062                         
00063                         return( 'TEST PASSED' );
00064                   }
00065                   catch( Exception $e )
00066                   {
00067                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00086             {
00087                   try
00088                   {
00089                         $ErrorLogAccess = get_package( 'error_log::error_log_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00093                         if( count( $Messages ) != 1 )
00094                         {
00095                               return( 'Illegal messages count' );
00096                         }

00101

00105                         {
00106                               return( 'Message was not deleted' );
